Original title: Memphis Belle
Year: 1990
Duration: 101 min.
Country: United Kingdom
Directed by Michael Caton- Jones
Written by Monte Merrick
Music: George Fenton
Photo: David Watkin
Cast: Matthew Modine, Eric Stoltz, Tate Donovan, DB Sweeney, Billy Zane, Sean Astin, Harry Connick Jr., Edward Reed Diamond, Courtney Gains, Neil Giuntoly, David Strathairn , John Lithgow, Jane Horrocks, Mac McDonald  Jodie Wilson, Keith Edward
Studio: UK-US co-production; Warner Bros. Pictures
Genre: War. Drama | World War II. Army. Aircraft. friendship

Synopsis:
---------
Drama set in the Second World War and based on the documentary made ??in 1943 by the American director William Wyler. The story focuses on the crew of "Memphis Belle", a huge B17 bomber which at the time was known as the "Flying Fortress." The "Memphis Belle" was one of the most famous bombers of World War II Allied army. The ten young Americans who make up his crew have survived twenty-four raids, and expect to receive instructions for its last mission before returning home. They think that it will be something simple , but to his surprise, received the order to bomb Dresden, Germany. This is a big risk, and possibly some of them lose their lives.
